summary: Provides a high-level pipeline that integrates Stable Diffusion with GLIGEN capabilities, allowing users to generate images conditioned on textual prompts and spatial layouts. Handles model initialization, configuration loading, and pretrained weight retrieval to streamline the generation workflow.
business_intent: Empowers developers and content creators to produce customized AI-generated visuals for marketing, design, entertainment, and other creative applications by offering an easy-to-use interface for advanced text‑and‑layout‑guided image synthesis.
